title: Introducing a Newsletter, sort of.
description: This is more so a way to streamline my own thoughts and creative ideas, but I have decided to convert this blog space into somewhat of a newsletter. Here's why I say "sort of":

authors.name: Kushagra Srivastava
authors.title: I write, code, and create. Sometimes all at the same time.
